Text: MKVONLY is this upload hv subtitles??

Really annoying. You need to download an mkv mixer in order to get audio working in any program. I tried 5 programs, none would allow audio to work until I mixed it. After it was mixed/combined, I could use VLC. Very annoying. Would not recommend, although the quality is fairly good. This is the first torrent that required this kind of work for me.

Wow. You think muxing one movie is work?
Look at the uploaders list of movies!
And actually exactly how I appreciate it. BIG THANKS to Sir Uploader!
